website_summaries.verdict: Far Cry 4 borrows a lot from the last game, but it adds enough excitement, fresh ideas and a brilliant new landscape to warrant the return trip.
pros: Far Cry 4 offers an amazing environment to traverse and explore
It features ultra-satisfying first-person-shooter gameplay along with new vehicles and equipment
And yes, you can ride elephants
cons: The main character is underwhelming and it has a nearly identical game structure to Far Cry 3, including cookie-cutter enemy design and archetypes

customer_reviews.title: Good Game, Similar to Farcry 3
customer_reviews.text: The story feels significantly less involved when compared to Farcry 3, although significantly better than Farcry 2. Without spoiling the ending, it was enough to ask questions about afterwards. However, once the story mission was over, I had very little interest in completing the rest of the side missions. Gameplay control is good, some minor glitches here and there, but not unusual for an open-world game. Can recommend for a cheaper used game. Wouldn’t mind seeing Farcry Blood Dragon again...
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: and intensity of this game are great, the story and game-play
customer_reviews.text: While the graphics, sound quality, and intensity of this game are great, the story and game-play, unfortunately do not live up to those high standards. For instance, there isn't a great introduction to the world of FarCry 4, there is barely a tutorial, and the controls are confusing in their default setting-- not to mention the inability to switch to a third person view when piloting, driving, etc. any sort of machinery, which makes it difficult to gauge exactly what you're doing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty to do and a nice non-online story based experience
customer_reviews.text: Very enjoyable game. Along with Far Cry 5, they are my favorites in a long time. Plenty to do and a nice non-online story based experience. No faults other than forcing you to use specific weapons on some missions. That was corrected in FC5, but it was a minor irritant. One of the reasons is because there are nice weapons in this game and you don't want to switch to something else when you get into the groove with your current favorite. Excellent game!
customer_reviews.author: Eagletree

customer_reviews.title: An amazing addition to the series
customer_reviews.text: This game has given me so much joy for the last couple months. I am pretty slow at beating games because I don't play a lot of them and I often like to play multiple games as opposed to just focusing on one until I finish. I personally love the entire Far Cry series(Except 2). This game plays similar to FC3 but it has plenty of added goodies and a TON of sick new weapons to unlock! You level up just like in FC3 and earn skill points. The graphics are absolutely breathtaking... Best FPS I have played since its predecessor.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: I been running this game on the ps3 for a long while. I must say these Far Cry series get better with every one. I do like that the weapons are things I can understand. I figure out what I want to do, and no giant monsters that I have to figure out how to kill a dozen times. Nothing comes back from the dead behind me. It's fairly straight forward. Take control of land, get rid of bad guys.
customer_reviews.author: John Dye

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game and great buy even if FC5 comes out in March.
customer_reviews.text: This game is fantastic. I bought this because I couldn't wait for the Far Cry 5 release. The gameplay is fantastic. The characters and villains are interesting and the themes of psychological manipulation and how they are implemented by political groups make the game relatable and makes you question who the real "villain" actually is (in my opinion, it's not Pagan Min). The map is huge and there is so much that you can do just to have fun. Highly recommend this game!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Mauss

customer_reviews.title: Good game, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Haven't never played any of the Far Cry titles, I didn't know what to expect from this game. I assumed it would be a first person shooter with tons of action. I what I didn't expect was an open world action first shooter game with tons of missions and side missions. At first, I enjoyed the game, but after awhile I became overwhelmed (lazy with the side missions) that side track from the main storyline. Not to take anything away from the game, its an awesome game. I know for sure if I had the time and patience like I did when I was younger, I would love this game. If you have the time and tolerance buy this game.
customer_reviews.author: Elmergenc

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I had this sent to my nephew. It was a great price, in fact half of what it cost at walmart or some other big box store. It came in in good shape and he has played it quite a bit. While I can't tell you personally about this game, I can tell you that my nephew is a 9 yr old gamer with a 30 yr old gamer mind. He knows all things games and this is one he loves. Just going by that- I would recommend this game to anyone who loves games or is looking for a game to give the gamer in their life.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha @ShoppingWives

customer_reviews.title: ... a first time player of this series I really enjoyed the game
customer_reviews.text: As a first time player of this series I really enjoyed the game. Tons of action, a cool leveling up system and a decent story with paths make for an interesting ride. As someone who wasn't a fan of first person games and preferred the 3rd person perspective, Far Cry 4 changed my mind and I'll check out more first person games in the future. Pros: Action, RPG elements and a fun experience. Cons: Some missions feel cheap/repetitive. Leveling up just to level up instead of leveling up your character with good reasons to. A very fun and addictive game. I would give it 4.5 stars if Amazon allowed it.
customer_reviews.author: Luxbrands

customer_reviews.title: But this is amazing for hand eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this game. He is rather young so we mute the sound since the words are not for children. I am sure you are thinking then he is too little to be playing the game. But this is amazing for hand eye coordination. And for what it is worth he has ADD and this game is calming for him. He can sit for hours and quitely play.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: you'll enjoy FarCry 4
customer_reviews.text: If you're a fan of FarCry, you'll enjoy FarCry 4. The graphics are really stunning. I'd find myself flying high above the land in my Buzzer, just enjoying the scenery. The new animals are ferocious (hello Eagle!) and also a bit helpful (love those elephants!). The story is nothing spectacular. The usual suspects...help the protagonists further their cause, but you have to choose to help one of two parties instead. I really enjoyed the voice acting of Troy Baker as Pagan Min. His little tirades throughout the game were exceptionally funny. The "secret" ending was a nice touch. The "secret secret" ending was worth a second play through. Lots of stuff to see and do. Not to be missed.
customer_reviews.author: halah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: update on farcry 4 so far. good graphics, but as you go on in the game it gets boring doing same thing over and over. there is more side missions than the campaign mode.after you beat the game- you will not play it no more,there is no replay value in farcry 4 at all. you will get mad at times playing farcry 4 because you go to a bell tower to another bell tower or killing animals after animals and you just get bored with it. save your money and wait for witcher 3 or batman.overall graphics are good like i said, but the gameplay is just boring,boring,boring
customer_reviews.author: W. W.

customer_reviews.title: but as a non-gamer (don't own a PS4) I'd say it's pretty cool. The times I did play it I ...
customer_reviews.text: I technically got this for my boyfriend, but as a non-gamer (don't own a PS4) I'd say it's pretty cool. The times I did play it I was literally blown away by how realistic parts of the forest are. There are even little trails you can go on that literally just take your breath away. The game allows you to swim, drive, fly, and even ride elephants (which are the ONLY animals that don't attack you or run away). The game also allows you to actually become a traitor by killing (or in my case accidentally running over) civilians. So, from the perspective of someone not really into those kinds of games, I'd say it's pretty freaking cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: More of the same, but that's not a bad thing!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a played a Far Cry game before you know exactly what you are getting. If you are new to the series, it is a good FPS (first person shooter) with some RPG (role playing game) character progression thrown in. It is easy to lose track of time wandering around collecting items and playing the side mission. If you played a Far Cry before I would advise waiting until you have empty spot in your gaming schedule, but if you are new to the Far Cry world this would be a nice holiday pick up.
customer_reviews.author: No One Special

customer_reviews.title: You feel as though you're spending time in this beautiful country. This game is not easy
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with the quality of graphics and immersion in this game. The open world makes this game fascinating, as you can walk around a huge area of land with very little restriction. You feel as though you're spending time in this beautiful country. This game is not easy. It has it's moments of difficulty, even on "Normal" setting, and often makes you very frustrated. This is the type of game that requires a bit of forethought, planning and stealth. For the cost of this game at the moment, it's a steal.
customer_reviews.author: BWhitTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: This is a good thing if you were very into the repetitive loop ...
customer_reviews.text: It's Far Cry 3 with more climbing and verticality. This is a good thing if you were very into the repetitive loop (climb tower, unveil map, defeat outposts) of 3, and a bad thing if you were looking for real innovation. The dynamic wildlife is as fun as ever, with the exception of eagles: unlike other predators which give you plenty of advanced warning, eagles only grant you a screech a half second before they decend upon you. Overall, as someone who does enjoy the Far Cry loop, I really dig this game.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Malebranche

customer_reviews.title: boring game
customer_reviews.text: i feel bored of this game, i did not continue to play it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Recently bought it for my son (gift)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased him seven games, as he is a new PS4 owner/player. All the games I got him were rated highly. He cannot stop talking about this particular game - graphics, gameplay, etc. he also remarked that it was not a "well known" game, and is planning on telling all his friends about it. This game makes a great gift. I'm too old to play games myself, so sorry I can't do better on the review. Five stars for the excitement my son feels, despite the fact this game is not as expensive as many are. Hope this helps someone out there.
customer_reviews.author: Brody

customer_reviews.title: Not melt favorite but Fun
customer_reviews.text: I like these games although they get repetitive which can be annoying, but this one was fun. Not my favorite but worth playing if your a fan of the series.
customer_reviews.author: kingpin

customer_reviews.title: Similar to Far Cry 3 but just as enjoyable if not moreso
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoyed Far Cry 3, you will enjoy Far Cry 4. For better or worse, it's basically the same game with some improvements and new environments. Some would think they got lazy and made a Far Cry 3.5 instead of Far Cry 4. I personally don't mind this. Far Cry 3 was very good and having a similar game on a newer generation console is just fine with me. Gave me plenty of hours of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Meeuwissen

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea of the number of hours I spent playing this game but so enjoyed it. Loved 3 and now 4, just hope they don't screw the series up. The graphics are great, world is massive, high interaction and immersion levels, and best of all maintains the interest the whole way through.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: On par with Farcry 3
customer_reviews.text: I beat the story and got the platinum trophy after probably 40 hours. The game play and open world is an improvement over farcry 3 and being able to free roam in coop is really fun for a couple hours. However the story is pretty lackluster compared to farcry 3. I expected another great story with an amazing villain but all I got was a standard video game story line. So overall, Farcry 3 had a better story and more interesting characters but Farcry 4 does everything else a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Sold on the Far Cry Franchise
customer_reviews.text: This was my first entry into the Far Cry franchise and I am totally impressed with this game. Like may others I am also a huge fan of the Fallout and Elder Scrolls series. I ordered FC4 about a year ago and spent many many hours playing. The open world is engaging, the game play is just challenging enough, and I enjoyed the story line. I liked this so much I went back and bought FC2 and FC3. Ubisoft has already released Far Cry Primal at the time of this review. I get the jokes/complaints about the similarities between the other Far Cry games, but I'm still looking forward to the next release.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Clark

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome game
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome game. I love the open world. I love exploring around. It's pretty easy to make money to upgrade weapons which is great. I love that I can totally play it in stealth mode or I can play choose to play it combat mode. Very flexible gameplay. It's also great that as the game progresses you have to make choices about who you're going to support. So you can go back and replay the game making different choices and see how it plays out differently. One of the best games out there.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Holman

customer_reviews.title: This is one helluva beautiful game and the gameplay is updated to fix most ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one helluva beautiful game and the gameplay is updated to fix most of the the things that annoyed me in FC3. Quick loot options, less hand holding tutorials, super tight controls. I really enjoy the setting and story so far. This one surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: A Ton of Fun
customer_reviews.text: FC4 has kept me entertained for hours. I like the entire story line and overall look and feel of the game. It can be challenging and has a lot of mission variety to keep things interesting. I plan to spend many more hours enjoying the game.
customer_reviews.author: Handsome_Hunk

customer_reviews.title: first game my 13 year old godson likes on the new generation consoles
customer_reviews.text: Actually my 13 year old godson loves it. It's the first game he's really enjoyed playing on the new generation gaming consoles, He has both an xbox 1 and ps4. He found the current generation of online fps so competitive if your'e not an avid gamer you don't have the skills needed to not get killed within a couple of minutes. He's totally turned off by them. I even cancelled his Halo preorder assuming it will only be geared for avid gamers and he used to spend hours playing it online with his xbox 360.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the far cry series and the graphics were just ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the far cry series and the graphics were just mind blowing on this one, like the stories more than the other far cry s. Pagan min is the bad guy of the year. riding elephants was awesome. Might go back and play this game again in a few year cause its was just so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: BevisLove

customer_reviews.title: Far Cry
customer_reviews.text: I am not really too big into FPS but Far Cry is one of my exception to policies. There is so much to do in this game. From Hunting, assassination contracts, upgrading equipment & your character. I am about 14 hours into the game and I don't feel like I've even touched it. My map is way incomplete and I've done about 3-4 main quests. Great game and I highly recommend to anyone who is a FPS or action RPG fan.
customer_reviews.author: TheBeastofMS

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great game hours of play and re-playable with different strategies. It does deserve the M due to language, drugs, situations, and the sheer volume of death and mayhem. We loved the elephants but cried when we had to hunt the snow leopards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still one of the funnest
customer_reviews.text: One of my favourite ever games. It feels like the took Far Cry 3 and boiled it down, concentrating the good bits. Exploration is fun and the environment is absolutely gorgeous. The missions are where it breaks down a bit, drug sequences are awful. Overall still one of the funnest games.
customer_reviews.author: Declan M.

customer_reviews.title: Very immersive and enjoyable.
customer_reviews.text: Great game. I got a PS4 at Christmas but couldn't find a game that kept my interest. I thought about selling the console. Far Cry 4 is exactly what I was looking for. Some shooting, some puzzles, exploration and a story that was interesting. Excited about 5 coming gout tomorrow (already bought the code).
customer_reviews.author: Lester Burford

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed playing the game
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed playing the game. Have done FC 2 and 3 and this is pretty much the same with some great additions. Really like having a buzzer ( one man helicopter) to get around sometimes and the use of the grapple hooks to climb mountains and lower to caves. After a while it does get a little boring or redundant, but theres enough to do to keep playing.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games on ps4
customer_reviews.text: I knew it was going to be good but this surpassed my expectations. The graphics are beautiful, there is so much to do, guns feel great, the map is huge, there is a lot of depth with the upgrading and crafting and selling, hunting is nice, you can drive vehicles while shooting as well as mid air car jacks and so much more. Buy it. I'm not much of a shooting fan and I still love this game this is a great single player game. Worth every penny and every hour of your time This is my first far cry. Besides playing the first one for a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I love all of the FarCry games
customer_reviews.text: I love all the Farcry games. I like to free roam in a game and you can do that in these games, plus always lots of details in the games. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Perkins

customer_reviews.title: 1st Far Cry game and I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever far cry experience. Background is beautiful and colorful, movement is smooth as on PS4. Storyline is interesting and you get lots of things to exploit such as animal hunting, vehicle driving and rock climbing. It's a unique experience as they advertised. I copped it at $29.99 and it's definitely worth it. I am usually not a first shooter fan cuz it's too dizzy for me, but this one is worth the money and the attention.
customer_reviews.author: keye

customer_reviews.title: A bright spot in a disappointing year of gaming,
customer_reviews.text: 2014 was a disappointing year in gaming. But this is was one the bright spots. Tons of content, over 50+ hours of fun. Great story beautiful graphics. This game has co-op which is very fun. The highlight of this game is the outposts which are always fun to takeover usuing different tactics. If you are a PS4 owner and you're looking to get the bang for the buck this is your kind of game.
customer_reviews.author: Viewsofac

customer_reviews.title: I really like this game
customer_reviews.text: I really like this game, I am not much of a FPS person but this game changed my mind. The graphics are amazing, I really feel like I am a part of the game and it is funny hearing the characters speak in Hindi (especially the cuss words) since it is one of the many languages I speak. There is so much to do and the map is HUGE! Wow just great fun def do recommend this game. This is my first Far Cry game, so I def looking for ward to Far Cry Primal!
customer_reviews.author: Irf

customer_reviews.title: The best game to play when none of your destiny friends are online
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing more fun and exciting than having a bear or elephant kill your enemies and then figuring out that that wasn't the smartest choice when you have the wild animal running towards you and tackling you Dicaprio style. The game is beautiful and there's always something to do even if you're lost; if you end up doing side quests, even those feel as important as the main story.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game
customer_reviews.text: I scooped this up for $14 on Prime Day and have loved every second I've played. Ubisoft executes the first person experience as well as anyone in the industry, and this game takes you on a wild ride. The primary campaign is ~16 hours, but fully exploring and completing the game could take another 20 beyond that. Tons of content, gorgeous visuals, eclectic characters, and a million fun things to do. A must-own for PS4 owners.
customer_reviews.author: James McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the full price
customer_reviews.text: This game really have the potential to be a lot better than I thought it would be. The "environment is beautiful but the mechanics of the game when it comes to gunplay are abysmal at best. The storyline doesn't really make much sense and there are way too many side quest to keep track of anything. Also quite buggy.
customer_reviews.author: Satan

customer_reviews.title: Captivating story, really fun and my all time favorite ps4 game so far
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing game! Really interesting plot, amazing graphics and overall really fun to play. Also quite an immersive world which was cool! My boyfriend and I looooved it and it has been our absolute favorite game so far on ps4! We actually played it twice through to see the alternate paths you can play through your choices in the game.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I always love the FarCry installments and this made me love the series even more. The free roam always make it enjoyable to play, whether I want to play the story mode or just do random things. It's similar to the gameplay of Grand Theft Auto without the violence and illegal actions but shooting, driving and numerous other free roaming actions. I would recommend for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: herroeverybody

customer_reviews.title: Broken game
customer_reviews.text: Far cry 4 had dropping frame rates,poor targetting system,and broken levels. As I played far cry if too many things appeared on screen the frame rate would drop almoat freezing the screen. When I would aim at an enemy my bullets wouldn't hit the target. I used a sniper rifle and was unablen to obtain a headshot. Futhermore, levels would just fall apart. I would activate a check point only to have the screen black out . Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: sirius

customer_reviews.title: Graphics/Sound: 5, Story: 4, Gameplay: 4
customer_reviews.text: The storyline isn't as clear/linear as the story in Far Cry 3 - you have to really work for it in this game, discovering notes and letters, talking to people, etc. - but it's still interesting. Very open world. Gameplay is very good as one would expect from previous Far Cry games. At times though the enemy AI can be a little silly (i.e., running around in circles because there's no direct path to the player). Graphics are stunning as is the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Buy this game.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Far Cry series. This game has an awesome location, really fun missions, and worth replaying.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: An Average Game. Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: The game is gorgeous and the game is a vast improvement over the previous titles when it comes to the mechanics and visuals. The story is boring and not compelling in any way, shape, or form. Pros: -Graphics -Gameplay -Co-op Cons: -Story -Characters It is simply an average game. Vaas from Far Cry 3 was a great antagonist, but sadly there is no one like him in this game or anyone even slightly as compelling as he was.
customer_reviews.author: ELDER12

customer_reviews.title: Pure, Simple Fun
customer_reviews.text: Certainly a game that has lived up to the hype, Farcry delivers on easy to understand controls, immersive story (if not suffering a bit from a clichéd villain) and gut wrenchingly funny action sequences. The voice acting is top notch. If you enjoyed the previous installments or enjoy free roaming games like The Elder Scrolls, this doesn't feel all that different from an open world aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Austin W.

customer_reviews.title: This made me glad I bought the PS4
customer_reviews.text: I liked FC3 and would rate it 3.5 starts, but FC4 is without a doubt my fav game on the PS4 so far. I took my time and completed all of the story missions and had a great time. Very challenging without being ridiculous. I may go back and play some co-op online because some of the youtube videos of co-op games make that also seem like a lot of fun. But I was very pleased with this game.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought farcry 5 and loved it. So decided to try out farcry 4, great game
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Worth countless hours of game play
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty much lost my husband to this game since i gave it to him for Christmas, his productivity level has decreased since he started playing and I have to pull him out of the zone every once in awhile to eat. Those are all good signs of a good game. Graphics are amazing and i even find myself watching him play every once in awhile to see the story unfold!
customer_reviews.author: katie rene siffert

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Good Game. I mean, it could be better, but I think that this beat Farcry 3... At least for me. I enjoy playing the game. Edit: Just a few things. If anyone is worried about the game crashing after 25% completion or so like it has said in other reviews, one of the game's updates, so no worries. Other than that, the game counts your playing time for you, and I completed the main part of the game in a little under 33 hours. (Not straight of course). I think its worth the $30 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Completely awesome game to play on PS4! This was my first FarCry game so the storyline and controls took some getting used to but after the learning curve the game was a blast. Platinum is not hard to achieve at all. The constant traveling from place to place can be daunting at times but that's what the small helicopter is for!
customer_reviews.author: LoJac963

customer_reviews.title: Love far cry primal, get this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love far cry games. This game is awesome and you can play for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fun, but kind of monotonous. Worth the price I paid but not a huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Game
customer_reviews.text: Great game! I play this game whenever I get the chance. It is a first-person shooter and you can buy online add-ons. The missions are varied and you can select which ones you wish to go on when you want. Choices made during the game affect the storyline. Graphics are great. Very realistic. The touchpad is a little hard to use to select different weapons but you get the hang of it. I have experienced very few glitches.
customer_reviews.author: 33Strings

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun game
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best first person shooters!! Those who played far cry 3 may be upset at the similarities, but the updated graphics and guns make it worth playing! Nothing better than mowing over enemies while riding an elephant!!
customer_reviews.author: Meesta Jason

customer_reviews.title: zany fun anyone?
customer_reviews.text: So much to do,easily a 40 plus hour game,fun and open world adventure,one of the best a.i.s in gaming ,challenging but fun,a bit buggy if you put in more than 4 hours,make sure you save and quit each time and then shut it down,this great for grand theft auto fans as well as other sandbox,open world title players ,pagan min is a great joker knockoff
customer_reviews.author: Osok.

customer_reviews.title: Great open-world game but lacks depth
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the game, but got bored after several hours of play, so I have not finished it. Too many of the quests are similar, so it feels like I am just grinding away. Will need to continue and finish, so I can update with the ending. The great thing about the game is that the world is a very large open-world map. You can choose to go to any area and I have always like those type of open-world, sandbox games.
customer_reviews.author: twtbird007

customer_reviews.title: Addicting open world FPS
customer_reviews.text: I love these games. Easy to pick up and play. Turn mind off. Shoot.
customer_reviews.author: MushaAleste

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my teen son
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time and package well. My 17 year old son got this and says he wants it rated a 5 star. So I'm guessing he really likes playing this game lol.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Parrick

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Far Cry 3 but for only around 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as Far Cry 3 but for only around 30 dollars theres no denying how good this game is. Talk about quality adventures with amazing graphics. Sure it looks better on the PC but the graphics are only a smart part of the gameplay. Exploration and the storyline make this game one of my favorites and I'm happy to own it on both the PC and PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo A.

customer_reviews.title: A great game, lots of content.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this one. Massive content and always plenty to do and choose what kind of "job" you're in the mood for at a particular time. The game is violent as expected but it's not "creepy gross" or wanton violence as I was afraid of. You can play the good fight and work on justice and help the good guys out. The karma point system really encourages this. I started using it about a week after the release date and have not had any technical problems. It should be safe to ignore temperamental cries in 1 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kristjan A. Kjartansson

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. I have only played Uncharted 4 on PS4 and this game is very close to that. Lots to do and a large map lets you wonder around. The wildlife is amazing and the story is fun. I recommend this game!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good price. Timely delivery... would definitely do repeat business.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be the first to admit that Far Cry 4 is nothing more than an upgraded Far Cry 3... and to me that is perfect. I loved the last one and I love this one. The game play is fantastic and the graphics and production quality are incredible. There is a bit of repetitiveness but overall it is a gloriously entertaining game!
customer_reviews.author: S. Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. If you love first person shooters don't play this because you won't put it down! You can hunt the bad guys or hunt wild animals or just skydive off the largest mountain you can find. Tons of guns. Vehicles to play with. The best part is you can play with your friends with online coop. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great open world game with plenty of fun things to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great open world game with plenty of fun things to do. Some people may think it as too repetitive but I found that it was just the right amount. This is the first game I've played of the Far Cry series and I am considering playing the others if I have the chance too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait for FarCry: Primal
customer_reviews.text: Though this game is over 2 years old, the graphics are still stunning, and the gameplay is one of the best FPS free-roaming games that I've ever played. I would recommend this game, but if you're on the edge about buying this one, I'd look up gameplay online and decide from there if it's the type of game for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Sold it.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't as fun as I had expected. The product it's self came on time and factory wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Moosh

customer_reviews.title: The best gameplay and graphics I've seen in a game ever
customer_reviews.text: The best gameplay and graphics I've seen in a game ever. Not a single glitch the entire time I played it. Plenty lengthy storyline and lots of side missions to keep you entertained. Controls work exactly how you need them to. Just the most flawless and fun game I've ever played.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great game, you'll hate it at first
customer_reviews.text: Great game, you'll hate it at first, it's somewhat complicated, but when you get used to it, it's great. This has so much to do, it will take you a few months. Another one of those games that feels like six hours goes by in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy F

customer_reviews.title: Familiar yet fun
customer_reviews.text: This is another Ubigame (Google Ubisoft Game: The Review) but that's not a bad thing. Pretty scenery, familiar gameplay but with new weapons, overall good. 30 fps though and that took a few hours to get used to. But no glitches, and fun. Bonus if you know Hindi-- you can understand the chatter natively! :)
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the game!
customer_reviews.text: Great game!! My husband and I both got a copy and are having a ton of fun. I have not played it completely through but I surely will and with pleasure. The co op play is a blast and the campaign (which is single player) is both entertaining and challenging. I heard the series was good but I had no idea the good times to be had!! Great job ubisoft!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: This game is SO worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Played this game for at least 2 months, almost every day. So much going on and the scenery and variety were amazing. Can't wait for Far Cry 5.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to Kyrat
customer_reviews.text: Pagan Min is my new favorite villain. Troy Baker's performance was AMAZING. The scenery and animal killing was also amazing. I'm glad I'll never desire to hunt animals in real life, now. The plot was weak. Meh. Even games with weak plots can be great. This one is.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly fun!
customer_reviews.text: I've played many open world games and have rarely bothered to complete all of the achievements/trophies since I get burnt out before that point. This game is the exception! I'm very close to getting a platinum trophy in this game. I've enjoyed it so much that I bought a copy for my friend so we can play co-op. I also bought him two copies of the strategy guide (one for him and one for me).
customer_reviews.author: Ian L

customer_reviews.title: Elephant rampage!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible game. Great graphics, almost perfect game play shooting is on point, you can play the game exactly to your play style. Do you want to take out that outpost with stealth? Grab a silenced pistol, machine gun, or sniper rifle, some throwing knives, and your good to go. Want to take it out guns blazing? Stick up on grenades, molotovs, rocket launchers and lmgs and blast away. Pesky enemies won't leave you alone and you're low on ammo, throw some bait and watch as a leopard mangles him as you run away, or watch if you want. Oh and did I mention you can go on a rampage while riding an elephant? Yeah you can do that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Petroski

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer.. U Must OWN this game
customer_reviews.text: This game is simply the best first person shooter open-world game to ever come out. I was speechless at how realistic the environment is on the PS4, and as for the animals; well lets just say that killing enemy NPCs with an RPG while charging at them on top of a elephant is one gaming experience I'll remember for a long time. Far Cry 3 was a masterpiece, Far Cry 4 continues that legacy. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Legite_man21

customer_reviews.title: GOod game
customer_reviews.text: Lots do play and do. Good story line. Lots of side missions.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyThings

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Really fun game! Has a lot of stuff to do and the missions vary a quite a bit so it doesn't get too boring. Capturing control of bases may be the main game mechanic, but the unlocks you get give you so many different ways to accomplish the goals that it makes up for it getting a little repetitive.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus F. Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as 3 but still fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is still a fun and great addition to Farcry, it just doesn't live up to its predecessor. Free Radio Kyrat is very repetitive and annoying. Its just done lazily. Some missions are great while others are meh, it makes me weary about the next installment.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Best Farcry yet.
customer_reviews.text: About the same gameplay as Farcry 3, but I like this storyline much better. There are some funny characters to brighten the mood, but there are also some spots that legitimately scare me. Co-op is fun, but you can't do campaign missions! All you can do is help each other with the outposts, bell towers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Alex McCool

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Its a farcry game I guess, if you've played the other ones you know if you like it or not. Has a couple things that are new and pretty cool, like the menu's, and UI. But mostly a lot of the same as 3, as far as weapons and gameplay, with a new story over it. I think the thing I like the most is that you get the wing suit, not just for 5 min. at the end like in 3.
customer_reviews.author: Michael provost

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Honey Badgers
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic open-world game. If you are someone who doesn't really need story to be compelled to play then you will enjoy this game. It's a polished experience. It's relatively violent, so not for younger audiences. It's easy to spend hours just wandering around and fending off animal attacks.
customer_reviews.author: Legionaire

customer_reviews.title: True Sandbox
customer_reviews.text: It truly has been a long time since I played a game that made me feel this way. This game is amazing. Remember the feeling you got when you first played Fallout? Yea, it's like that AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Rex Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Far Cry 4 keeps the train moving
customer_reviews.text: While not as refined as Far Cry 3 in character and story line, Far Cry 4 still offers an unforgettable experience with Pagan Min as your antagonist, except in a different scary way than in Far Cry 3. The overall game is still excellent and I would still recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game
customer_reviews.text: Do you enjoy action? Well this games for you! Guns..check Explosions..check Eye candy graphics..check Huge "open" map tons of side quest...check Riding big animals to smite your enemies..check
customer_reviews.author: falcor

customer_reviews.title: the missions are challenging and the game play is tremendously fun! Bundle that together with some amazing graphics and ...
customer_reviews.text: Far Cry 4 is everything an open world game should be. The campaign story is compelling, the missions are challenging and the game play is tremendously fun! Bundle that together with some amazing graphics and you have yourself a definite winner.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good game.
customer_reviews.text: So far, it’s a great game. Came in time and brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Alice Paige

customer_reviews.title: Good game for some men for others
customer_reviews.text: Ok game and ended up trading it in but its ok
customer_reviews.author: Michael lucas

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to Far Cry series
customer_reviews.text: Many changes from Far Cry 3 that I appreciate. More streamlined harvesting and crafting. The story was OK, I preferred the island setting and being a morally questionable young adult in Far Cry 3 though. The elephant combat was a fun addition but not very practical most of the time due to rarity of spawn points. Overall worth the purchase, glad I waited for the price to come down though.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Matthews

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: Keeping me plenty entertained as of now. Like the customization as well as the HUGE map. Haven't had any issues at all with the game. Scenery is beautiful, hunting is fun, helping the Golden Path is great. I definitely recommend this game. I will be playing it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Motts

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: its an ok game if you find it cheap enough
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: I ended up being hooked from the get go and spent a good 40 hours on this game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game expecting to just casually play through the campaign and be done with it. I ended up being hooked from the get go and spent a good 40 hours on this game. Addictive side quests, fun main campaign and killer graphics. I'm also definitely going to be getting all the DLC. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Jones

customer_reviews.title: 20 hrs and countin
customer_reviews.text: Fun game...a little redundant at times. I've clocked in 23 hours so far and only completed 35 percent of the game. Lots to explore. The arena is a blast. One of the best games I've ever purchased. 19.99 on amazon..
customer_reviews.author: Nato

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my favorite shooter of all time... great character development and great action
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shooter game
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad shooter game. Get's a little boring after a while doing the same things over and over. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Mind-blowing fun!
customer_reviews.text: If there was one next gen game to own, this would be the one. The original Farcry was WAY ahead of it's time. It busted down the door imho as far as sandbox type environments. This game doesn't just bust down the door, it blows the $*!%ing door of the hinges!!! Get it, you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ZankFrappa

customer_reviews.title: Great Game! Great Price. 60+ Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This game is endless! I love it and can't get enough. I expect it to take me around 60-100 hours to complete 100% and I can't wait to finish it 100%. What a great deal for a great game. Cons: It is a little repetitive. The radio is repetitive and the amount of things to do in Kyrat might be overwhelming. Hard is hard.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan With A Y

product_meta.title: Far Cry 4 - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description:
Platform:PlayStation 4| Edition:StandardSEQUEL TO THE #1 RATED SHOOTER OF 2012*

Built from the legendary DNA of its award-winning predecessor, Far Cry 4 delivers the most expansive and immersive Far Cry experience ever in an entirely new and massive open world. With integrated drop-in/drop-out open world co-op play, Far Cry 4 re-imagines the cooperative experience for the next generation. You’ll now be able to discover and explore the living open world of Kyrat together.

Hidden in the towering Himalayas lies Kyrat, a country steeped in tradition and violence. You are Ajay Ghale. Traveling to Kyrat to fulfill your mother’s dying wish, you find yourself caught up in a civil war to overthrow the oppressive regime of dictator Pagan Min. Explore and navigate this vast open world, where danger and unpredictability lurk around every corner. Here, every decision counts, and every second is a story. Welcome to Kyrat.

*Based on Metacritic as of 12/18/2012
feature_bullets: REVOLUTIONARY OPEN WORLD CO OP: Far Cry 4 allows for a second player to drop in and out at any point, re imagining the cooperative experience in the true spirit of Far Cry for the next generation
MASSIVE OPEN WORLD: Discover the most diverse Far Cry world ever created; With terrain spanning from lush forests to the snow capped Himalayas, the entire world is alive and deadly
ABUNDANT NEW WILDLIFE: From leopards, rhinos, black eagles, and vicious honey badgers, as you embark on your hunt for resources, know that something may be hunting you

NEW WAYS TO GET AROUND: Scout enemy territory from above in the all new gyrocopter and then plummet back to earth in your wing suit; Climb aboard the back of a six ton elephant and unleash its raw power on your enemies
POWERFUL NEW WEAPONS: Choose the right weapon for the job, no matter how insane or unpredictable that job might be; With a diverse arsenal, you’ll be prepared for anything

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,906 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
